name: paths
title: Paths
description:
A GeoPressureR `path` constains the positions of a bird's trajectory. 

{:.alert .alert-info}
In GeoPressureR, there are 4 types of path : `tag`, `most_likely`, `simulation` and `geopressureviz`. See [`paths.type`](#type) for more details. 

 `path` should always be used in combinaison with [`staps`](geopressurer/staps) which can be JOIN by `tag_id` and `stap_id`.

fields.name: tag_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the tag. Foreign key to [`tags.tag_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/core/tags#tag_id).

fields.name: stap_id
fields.description: Identifier of the stationary period. Foreign key to [`staps.stap_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/geopressurer/staps#stap_id)

fields.name: type
fields.description:
One of:
 - `tag`: Create with [`tag2path()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag2path) from a likelihood map (e.g., ).
 - `most_likely`: Created with [`graph_most_likely()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/graph_most_likely.html)
- `simulation`: created by [`graph_simulation()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/graph_simulation): 
- `geopressureviz`: created by [`geopressureviz()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/geopressureviz).

fields.name: ind
fields.description: Indices of the 2D coordinate of the spatial map defined in [`GeoPressureR::tag_set_map()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag_set_map) (see also [`GeoPressureR::map_expand()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/map_expand). Useful to retrieve information on the graph (e.g. [`GeoPressureR::path2edge()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/path2edge). This value is the main way to create a path in GeoPressureR through [`GeoPressureR::ind2path()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/ind2path).

fields.name: j
fields.description: Only useful for `paths.type='simulation'`. Unique identifier for each trajectory, integer from `1` to `nj` as defined in [`GeoPressureR::graph_simulation()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/graph_simulation)`.

fields.name: interp
fields.description: Only useful for `paths.type='tag'`. Boolean value to indicate if the position was interpolated as defined by the `interp` parameter in [`GeoPressureR::tag2path()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag2path).

fields.name: known
fields.description: Boolean to indicate if the position is taken from a known value. Genearally, `TRUE` if [`staps.known_lat`](geopressurer/staps#known_lat) and [`staps.known_lon`](geopressurer/staps#known_lon) provided. Only different if `paths.type='tag'` and `use_known=FALSE` used in [`GeoPressureR::tag2path()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag2path).
